title: Animals hear in many ways
creator_credit: Norman Bean, Norman Bean Films and Film Associates of California
brief_description: Animals hear when sound vibrations produce similar vibrations in their own bodies. This film shows how different parts of animals’ bodies may be specially adapted to receive the vibrations. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.
